channel.title: CVE Feed for Atlassian -- Jira Server and Data Center
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Atlassian -- Jira Server and Data Center

item.title: CVE-2019-20106|2024-08-05T02:32:10.627Z -- atlassian -- jira%20server%20and%20data%20center
item.description: Comment properties in Atlassian Jira Server and Data Center before version 7.13.12, from 8.0.0 before version 8.5.4, and 8.6.0 before version 8.6.1 allows remote attackers to make comments on a ticket to which they do not have commenting permissions via a broken access control bug.
